SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.view.GUI.Scene

Class GameControllerScene

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.observer.ViewObservable
it.polimi.ingsw.view.GUI.Scene.GameControllerScene
All Implemented Interfaces:
Controller
public class GameControllerScene extends ViewObservable implements Controller
This class is the controller of the game scene It contains all the methods that are called by the view to update the scene
